name: Survince
description:
WARNING: This game is very difficult! Play at your own risk.

Survince is a short game about surviving obstacles while also collecting coins. 
(This game is also on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/560617359/)

Features:
- 8 different songs
- Character Selection
- Change to 4 different backgrounds.
- Mobile Mode and Keyboard Mode (A.K.A Arrow Keys)
